## Government Tender Announcement
### Request for Proposal: HMI, Human Machine Interface

**Procurement Reference Number:** PW-23-01026852

**Solicitation Number:** W8482-231271/A

**Publication Date:** February 21, 2023

**Tender Closing Date:** April 3, 2023 at 2:00 PM EST

**Contracting Entity:** Department of National Defence

**End User:** Department of National Defence

**Project Overview:**

The Department of National Defence invites proposals for the Human Machine Interface (HMI) for delivery at CFSD, Montreal. The requirement is subject to a preference for Canadian Goods and Services (CFTA).

**Scope of Work:**

- Item 1: HMI, Human Machine Interface (GSIN: 4810)
  - Quantity: 8 units
  - Unit of Issue: Each
  - Delivery Location: CFSD, Montreal

**Proposal Requirements:**

- Bidders must submit prices in Canadian dollars. Bids submitted in foreign currency will be rejected.
- Bidders proposing an equivalent or substitute product must indicate the brand name and model, part number, and NCAGE.

**Submission Details:**

- Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.
- For a complete description of the scope of work and proposal requirements, please refer to the Request for Proposal (RFP) document.

**Contact Information:**

- Jean-Pierre Normandin
- Email: [jean-pierre.normandin@forces.gc.ca](mailto:jean-pierre.normandin@forces.gc.ca)
- Phone: 819-939-3674

**RFP Documents:**

- English: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/02/21/599dabb773a78aabe8ef487c8ab2eb75/rfp_w8482-231271-a-en.pdf
- French: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/02/21/7b1a72a3415000d679f12bab52d7b13e/rfp_w8482-231271-a-fr.pdf
- (Please note that the documents may be downloaded in either official language of Canada.)
